Method Detail

mask

public static java.lang.String mask(java.lang.String str,
                                    org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                    org.slf4j.event.Level level)
Mask centre of a String with asterisks. Will cap out at the length of ASTERISK_MASK for number of asterisks included (i.e. a 300 character String).

Parameters:
str - to maskUri.
logger - to inspect for current logging level - nothing is actually logged within this method.
level - intended level of logging.
Returns:
str masked, or null if it was null or the logger is not logging at level.

mask

public static java.lang.String mask(java.lang.String str)
Masks a String value. This will always run irrespective of logging, and is suitable only for use in masking values that will always be returned, for example messages to users and in toString methods.

Parameters:
str - to maskUri.
Returns:
masked value.
See Also:
for ability to run according to logging.

maskUri

public static java.lang.String maskUri(java.net.URI uri,
                                       org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                       org.slf4j.event.Level level)
Inspects a URI and masks any sensitive parameter values. The sensitive param names are defined by OBSCURE_PARAM_NAMES, and are matched by searching the parameter name as to whether it contains the name.

Parameters:
uri - to mask
logger - to inspect current logging level - nothing is actually logged within this method.
level - intended log level
Returns:
masked uri, or null if logger is not logging at level.

maskUri

public static java.lang.String maskUri(java.lang.String uriStr,
                                       org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                       org.slf4j.event.Level level)
Inspects a URI and masks any sensitive parameter values. The sensitive param names are defined by OBSCURE_PARAM_NAMES, and are matched by searching the parameter name as to whether it contains the name.

Parameters:
uriStr - to mask
logger - to inspect current logging level - nothing is actually logged within this method.
level - intended log level
Returns:
masked uri, or null if logger is not logging at level.

isLevelEnabled

public static boolean isLevelEnabled(org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                                     org.slf4j.event.Level level)
Identify if the specified Logger will actually log at the level specified.

Parameters:
logger - to inspect.
level - to query.
Returns:
true if level will be logged by logger.
